Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Amulet
Description: Amulet with two differently treated surfaces: the first one is flat whereas the other is fashioned in the likeness of the profile of a sitting child bringing his right hand to his mouth.  The face is elongated in the Amarna fashion, the lines on the body representing the folds of clothing. The side lock of youth is depicted on the side of the face. The suspension ring at the top of the head has disappeared.
